page.title: 07BESTWOOD VILLAGE TODAY
page.content: {LIFE STYLES The village has one public house and a miners' welfare.The public house is called the Bestwood Hotel.The landlord provides dancing and groups.The miners welfare also provides similar activities.The Bestwood male voice choir meet in the welfare,so do the Bestwood Black Diamond Band.Senior citizens meet there also. {HEALTH The village does not have its own doctor.The villagers have to attend helth centres in Hucknall and Bulwell.The school has a baby clinic on every Monday.There is no chemist shop in the village.The residents, however, seem to live to a ripe old age!
